roleset.name: damage by walking on
roleset.note: TRAMPLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'trample' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from trample.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: After [*trace*-2]-1 being trampled *trace*-1 in Tuesday's selling stampede, [the Nasdaq over-the-counter market]-2 dusted itself off and moved on in moderate trading.

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: We know that your hatred of your master and executioner Saddam Hussein only comes from the fact that he is someone who knew how to keep you in check and trampled on your necks with his shoes for more than thirty years .
